title: event.bookingInfo
description: Booking info of the [event](../event.json), containing one or more phone numbers, email addresses, and/or website URLs.

phone.description: List of phone numbers for booking purposes (can be empty)

email.description: List of email addresses for booking purposes (can be empty)

url.description: List of URLs for booking purposes (can be empty)

items.description: URL to a website for booking purposes.
